description:
Go to https://incogni.com/coldfusion for 60% off!

With $10 billion spent, Apple's secretive car project has been cancelled, but what went wrong, and why did they want to make a car? In this episode we find out the confusion and chaos behind the scenes. 

Sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1GJqsoK3dHP5EkfaFSX-sAR3e_KJmISK9KLTkTACPBBk/edit?usp=sharing

title: The Apple Car - A $10 Billion Failure
